name: Wolf Island
description:
Wolf Island

Stuck on an island with wolves. The only thing to do is collect materials laying around the island and built yourself a boat to get to the next island. With three lives per level you need to get to as many islands as you can. If you find yourself caught by a wolf three times in a single level you have to start all over again. Collect coins and buy yourself some upgrades to help you along the way.

This game is still in development. We are constantly working on updates so keep an eye open!
